conclusion: Analyze the flow path of the liquid from points A, B, and C.
Liquid flows from A at the top left corner downward and to the right, passing through green and gray baffles.
Liquid flows from B at the top center downward and to the right, passing through the cyan baffle.
Liquid flows from C at the top right corner downward and to the left, passing through the green baffle.
Liquid from A and C will be directed downward and to the right by the green baffle.
Liquid from A will be directed further to the right by the gray baffle.
Liquid from B will be directed downward and to the right by the cyan baffle.
Liquid from B will be directed further to the right by the yellow baffle.
Liquid from B will be directed further to the right by the orange baffle.
Liquid from A and C will be directed towards container D after passing through the green baffle.
Liquid from B will be directed towards container E after passing through the cyan, yellow, and orange baffles.
Container D receives liquid from A and C.
Container E receives liquid from B.
Final answer: Liquid flows into Container D from A and C, and into Container E from B.
